# Binding Earth, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Earth Spells|earth]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Druid Spells|Druid 6]], [[6th Level Witch Spells|Witch 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 11]], [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature or object/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 149

This spell functions as *[[Binding Earth (Spell)|binding earth]]*, except as noted above.
